entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the initial and ongoing damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Depth Charge
entries: With a boom that can be heard 500 feet away, a pulse of thunder ripples out from a point you choose within range. Each creature in a 20-footradius sphere centred on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. A target takes {@dice 7d6} thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. This damage increases to {@dice 9d6} if the affected creature is submerged in a liquid.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Endotherm
entries: As you inhale, you drain the heat from the air and creatures around you in a 20-foot radius sphere. Each creature in the area must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it takes {@dice 5d6} cold damage and has its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature takes half as much damage and is not slowed. Until the end of your next turn, your speed increases by 10 feet for each Small or larger creature that failed the saving throw.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Frogskin
entries: You morph your skin and clothing into that of a slimy, poisonous frog. Make a melee spell attack against a creature within your reach. On a hit, the target takes {@dice 3d8} poison damage, and is poisoned until the end of your next turn. Until the spell ends, you can make the attack again on each of your turns as an action.

entries.name: Grappling
entries: For the duration, you have advantage on checks and saves made to avoid being grappled or restrained, and disadvantage on any attempts you make to grapple. Any creature grappling you, or that you are grappling, must make a Constitution saving throw at the start of each of its turns, taking {@dice 3d8} poison damage on a failure, or half as much damage on a success.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Stench
entries: Emanating from a point within range, a noxious, 20-foot-radius sphere of colorless fumes creates a choking, eye-watering miasma that penetrates through creatures' skin. When a creature enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes {@dice 3d6} poison damage and becomes poisoned until the end of its next turn. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage and is not poisoned. Whilst poisoned in this way, a creature has disadvantage on saving throws made to maintain its concentration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

monster.name: Earthy Inkling
languages: understands Abyssal and Common but can't speak

trait.name: Inky Form
entries: The earthy inkling can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The earthy inkling has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The earthy inkling can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The earthy inkling has advantage on saving throws against spells or other magical effects.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 1 poison damage.

monster.name: Nimble Inkling
languages: understands Abyssal and Common but can't speak

trait.name: Inky Form
entries: The nimble inkling can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The nimble inkling can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The nimble inkling has advantage on saving throws against spells or other magical effects.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The nimble inkling has advantage on attack rolls as long as one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 1 poison damage.

monster.name: Ocean Inkling
languages: understands Abyssal and Common but can't speak

trait.name: Inky Form
entries: The ocean inkling can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Aquatic Translucence
entries: The ocean inkling is lightly obscured while fully immersed in water, appearing only as a scattered mass of pigmented liquid.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The ocean inkling can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The ocean inkling can only breathe underwater.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 1 poison damage.

monster.name: Winged Inkling
languages: understands Abyssal and Common but can't speak

trait.name: Inky Form
entries: The winged inkling can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The winged inkling has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The winged inkling can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The winged inkling has advantage on saving throws against spells or other magical effects.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage plus 1 poison damage.
